channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Rational Collaborative Lifecycle Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Rational Collaborative Lifecycle Management

item.title: CVE-2017-1316|2024-09-17T00:05:59.700Z -- ibm -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Rational Quality Manager and IBM Rational Collaborative Lifecycle Management 5.0 through 5.0.2 and 6.0 through 6.0.5 are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 125728.
